form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Hawley introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of the Army to conduct military construction projects to replace military family housing units at Fort Leonard Wood, Missouri, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Restoring Fort Leonard Wood Act of 2025.

section.header: Military construction projects to replace military family housing units at Fort Leonard Wood, Missouri

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Army shall conduct a military construction project or military construction projects to replace 1,142 units of military family housing at Fort Leonard Wood, Missouri.
There is authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary of the Army $700,000,000 to carry out subsection (a).
